content.text:
[@piet](@U5GvOKP/YUza9k53DSXxT0mk3PIrnyAmessvNfZl5E0=.ed25519) 

Thanks, I'll take a look at that. Is that still something you'd like to see merged?

---

I've got some debug statements set up and I can see that the gossip scheduler is calling `connect()` repeatedly, but no messages are coming in. I'm not really sure why that is, but I'll continue debugging. Here's what I'm seeing (over and over and over again):

```
  ssb-server connecting: seeds +2s
  ssb-server connecting: local +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: friends +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: attemptFriend +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: retryFriends +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: longterm +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: retry +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: legacy +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: seeds +2s
  ssb-server connecting: local +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: friends +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: attemptFriend +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: retryFriends +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: longterm +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: retry +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: legacy +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: seeds +2s
  ssb-server connecting: local +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: friends +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: attemptFriend +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: retryFriends +1ms
  ssb-server connecting: longterm +0ms
  ssb-server connecting: retry +2ms
  ssb-server connecting: legacy +1ms
```
